titleStmt.title: A sermon of good works Preached at Feckenham, in the county of Worcester, on Thursday in Whitsun-week, May 17, 1697. at the yearly meeting of the feofees, appointed by Sir Thomas Cookes baronet, to manage the charity given by him, for educating and providing for twelve poor children there, and for maintaining a school-master to instruct them in learning and piety. By John Jephcott, D.D. prebendary of Worcester, and rector of All Saints in the burrough of Evesham.
titleStmt.author: Jephcott, John, 1639 or 40-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Jones, bookseller in Worcester; and are to be sold at the Dolphin and Crown in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With four final pages of advertisement.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
